[Groovy] Class StagingareaController

java.lang.Object
  org.objectrepository.security.NamingAuthorityInterceptor
      org.objectrepository.security.StagingareaController

@Secured(['ROLE_OR_USER'])
class StagingareaController
extends NamingAuthorityInterceptor

UserController We will use LDAP for creating ftp accounts. Not user accounts.

Lucien van Wouw

Method Detail

authentication

private org.springframework.security.authentication.UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken authentication(java.lang.Object params)
authentication Create an UsernamePasswordAuthenticationToken for the oauth authentication provider. See config grails.plugins.springsecurity.controllerAnnotations.staticRules: ROLE_OR_USER will allow access to the oauth controller ROLE_OR_USER_[na] will allow access to the resource
Parameters:
na
Returns:
